books.title: The Silent Horizon
books.author: Emily Carter
books.overview: A gripping novel about resilience and hope, following a journalist uncovering secrets in a near-future world.

books.title: Code of Tomorrow
books.author: Daniel Wright
books.overview: A fast-paced thriller exploring artificial intelligence, ethical hacking, and the consequences of unchecked innovation.

books.title: Whispers of the Past
books.author: Sophia Nguyen
books.overview: A historical fiction novel weaving together family secrets, love, and memories across generations.

books.title: Beyond the Stars
books.author: Michael Torres
books.overview: An epic science fiction adventure following humanity’s first mission beyond the solar system.

books.title: The Hidden Path
books.author: Aisha Rahman
books.overview: A self-discovery journey that blends philosophy and storytelling to inspire mindful living.

books.title: Echoes in the Dark
books.author: Robert Miles
books.overview: A psychological thriller about a detective haunted by an unsolved case and his own past.

books.title: The Art of Small Wins
books.author: Laura Bennett
books.overview: A motivational book focused on building habits, achieving goals, and celebrating incremental progress.

books.title: Desert Winds
books.author: Omar Hassan
books.overview: A powerful drama set in a remote desert town, exploring survival, tradition, and change.

books.title: Digital Minds
books.author: Priya Malhotra
books.overview: An insightful look into the future of human-computer interaction and the rise of intelligent machines.

books.title: The Last Kingdom’s Heir
books.author: James Holloway
books.overview: A fantasy novel filled with political intrigue, ancient magic, and a reluctant hero’s destiny.
